Event.Message:
Cryptographic Operation failed.
Cryptographic Parameters: OperationType: %1 Provider Name: %2 Key Name: %3 Key Type: %4 Algorithm Name: %5
Failure Information: Return Code: %6
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OperationType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProviderName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="KeyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="KeyType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AlgorithmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Open Provider operation failed.
Cryptographic Parameters: Provider Name: %1 Failure Information: Return Code: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Open Key operation failed.
Cryptographic Parameters: Provider Name: %1 Key Name: %2 Failure Information: Return Code: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="KeyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Create Key operation failed.
Cryptographic Parameters: Provider Name: %1 Key Name: %2 Algorithm Name: %3 Flags: %4 Failure Information: Return Code: %5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProviderName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="KeyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AlgorithmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Protect Key operation failed.
Cryptographic Parameters: Protector Name: %1 Protector Attributes: %2 Flags: %3 Failure Information: Return Code: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProtectorName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ProtectorAttributes" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Unprotect Key operation failed.
Cryptographic Parameters: Protector Name: %1 Recipient Type: %2 Flags: %3 Failure Information: Return Code: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProtectorName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RecipientType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="KeyIdLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="KeyId" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="KeyIdLength"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Protect Secret operation failed.
Cryptographic Parameters: Flags: %1 Failure Information: Return Code: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Unprotect Secret operation failed.
Cryptographic Parameters: Flags: %1 Failure Information: Return Code: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="ProcessName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
